Package space.sunqian.common.net.udp

Interface UdpServerHandler

public interface UdpServerHandler
Handler for handling udp server events for UDP network server, based on DatagramChannel.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    channelRead(@Nonnull DatagramChannel channel, byte @Nonnull [] data, @Nonnull SocketAddress address)
    This method is invoked after the server receives a data packet.
    void
    exceptionCaught(@Nullable DatagramChannel channel, @Nonnull Throwable cause)
    This method is invoked after catching an unhandled exception, the exception may come from this handler or from the container running this handler.
    static @Nonnull UdpServerHandler
    nullHandler()
    Returns an instance of UdpServerHandler that does nothing but discards received data.

  • Method Details

    • nullHandler

      @Nonnull static @Nonnull UdpServerHandler nullHandler()
      Returns an instance of UdpServerHandler that does nothing but discards received data.
      Returns:
      an instance of UdpServerHandler that does nothing but discards received data

    • channelRead

      void channelRead(@Nonnull @Nonnull DatagramChannel channel, byte @Nonnull [] data, @Nonnull @Nonnull SocketAddress address) throws Exception
      This method is invoked after the server receives a data packet.
      Parameters:
      channel - the channel where the data is received
      data - the array contains the received data
      address - the address of the data sender
      Throws:
      Exception - for any error

    • exceptionCaught

      void exceptionCaught(@Nullable @Nullable DatagramChannel channel, @Nonnull @Nonnull Throwable cause)
      This method is invoked after catching an unhandled exception, the exception may come from this handler or from the container running this handler.

      The behavior is undefined if this method still throws an exception.

      Parameters:
      channel - the channel parameter of the method where this handler throws the exception, may be null if the exception is not thrown from this handler
      cause - the unhandled exception
